snippet: One aid worker was killed and three others  wounded when a grenade hit their office during a gunfight between competing security forces in Darfur.
abstract: One aid worker is killed and three others wounded when grenade hits their office during gunfight between competing security forces in Nyala, biggest city in Darfur region of Sudan.
lead_paragraph: One aid worker was killed and three others  wounded when a grenade hit their office during a gunfight between competing security forces in Darfur.

headline.main: Sudan: Aid Workers Hit in Cross-Fire
headline.print_headline: Sudan: Aid Workers Hit in Cross-Fire
